message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  I could go down to $11,000. I'm confident this is a fair price considering the value it offers.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider my revised offer?
